original_title: SCANDAL - EVERYBODY SAY YEAH! -TEMPTATION BOX TOUR 2010- ZEPP TOKYO
overview: EVERYBODY SAY YEAH! -TEMPTATION BOX TOUR 2010- ZEPP TOKYO is SCANDAL’s second live DVD.  It contains footage from their tour “SCANDAL TEMPTATION BOX TOUR 2010″ ~YEAH! tte Iei!~ on October 2, 2010 at Zepp Tokyo.
title: SCANDAL - EVERYBODY SAY YEAH! -TEMPTATION BOX TOUR 2010- ZEPP TOKYO
